articles.title: India Launches New Tech Innovation Program
articles.author: Rohan Verma
articles.content: India announced a new innovation program focusing on AI, robotics, and space tech to boost startups and research across the nation.

articles.title: Global Markets Show Strong Growth
articles.author: Sanya Kapoor
articles.content: Stock markets around the world reported positive trends as investors showed confidence in the global economic recovery.

articles.title: Record-Breaking Rainfall in Mumbai
articles.author: Amit Desai
articles.content: Mumbai experienced its highest December rainfall in a decade, causing disruptions in traffic and daily activities.

articles.title: New Health Guidelines Introduced for Winter
articles.author: Dr. Neha Sharma
articles.content: The Health Ministry released new guidelines to prevent seasonal flu, including precautions for children and senior citizens.

articles.title: Upcoming Movie Breaks Advance Booking Records
articles.author: Raj Singh
articles.content: The upcoming action-thriller has already set a new record with millions of advance ticket bookings across India.

articles.title: National Sports Championship Begins Today
articles.author: Kavya Mehra
articles.content: Athletes from all states have gathered for the annual championship featuring 20+ sports events across a week-long competition.
